verse_text: Give thanks in all circumstances; for this is God’s will for you in Christ Jesus.
reflection: Give thanks in all circumstances; for this is God’s will for you in Christ Jesus. This reminds me that grateful in all things is possible today through God’s presence. Tonight, I RELEASE every weight and SURRENDER fully to the Lord's covering.
prayer: Father, as I rest, seal grateful in all things in my heart and renew my strength for tomorrow. 🙏 I lay it ALL down and yield completely to You, Lord.
